issue.title: [Developer] Update dev instructions to note there may be a timelag
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10543](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10543). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When following the developer instructions, I was hung up for a while on the fact that there seemed to be a timelag between when I completed the gitbox setup and when permissions were actually granted to the repo. Update the docs to try and help the next person.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10543?focusedCommentId=17229583) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8622
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8622>
